desc: BitLoop has a range of USB Type C hubs, docking stations, and adapters for use with Apple MacBook Pro's, Air, and other USB C devices such as smartphones and tablets. Shop our range of high quality multi-port adapters and hubs which feature ports such as HDMI 4K, SD Card Readers, Ethernet, VGA, and more.

layout.text: For Macs, Windows Laptops, Android Phones & iPad Pros
